overview: Ron Williams' latest foray into the beauty of the male physique, shot in Miami and Miami Beach, could make the most jaded individual relocate to Florida. Six wet-dream-worthy young men, ranging from boyish to rugged, flaunt their near-perfect to flawless faces and forms for the adoring camera, finding nearly any excuse to lose their shirts (or, in some cases, much more).
tagline: Seven muscular fitness models set in the tropical beauty of South Florida.
title: Flex Appeal
